title: MSD | Home
description: At MSD, we're following the science to tackle some of the world's greatest health threats. Get a glimpse of how we work to improve lives.
cleaned_text: Next story: Patients Progress in ovarian cancer research starts with patients Health awareness Is your child up to date on their vaccines? Make a plan today Health awareness Endometrial cancer: understanding the signs and symptoms Innovation Our Q2 2023 earnings report We use the power of leading-edge science to save and improve lives around the world We're following the science to tackle some of the world's greatest health threats. But don't take it from us - see what our people and patients say. Our pipeline We follow the science where we can make the greatest difference, now and in the future. Your well-being is our purpose We work hard to bring you the medications and vaccines that help fight some of the most serious health concerns facing all of us. Where creativity meets research We bring creative minds together to invent important medicines and vaccines. We stop at nothing to help save and improve lives. Sustainability We operate responsibly every day to enable a safe and healthy future for people and communities globally. Media See our latest news, announcements and multimedia resources.
